website_summaries.verdict: Neutral runners and athletic shoe enthusiasts mostly welcomed the Reebok Fusion Flexweave. They liked its lightweight configuration, its versatile design, the responsive cushioning system and the comfortable fit. Conversely, there were complaints about a cheap-looking façade, an extended break-in period, and an unsupportive upper. Overall, this road companion, while not being perfect, gained a following of avid testers.
pros: Most of those who have tried the Reebok Fusion Flexweave were happy with its unique look and color schemes
Some people used this running shoe for gym workouts, and they stated that it worked well
The width profile catered to the expectations of many runners
The underfoot cushioning system was lauded for being efficient and responsive
Several purchasers felt that the weight of this product was agreeably light
Consumers greatly appreciated the traction capacity of the outsole rubber
Certain reviewers thought that the general durability of the Fusion Flexweave was reliable
People have often described the in-shoe experience to be ‘comfortable,’ even with long-term use
cons: Several testers noted that the upper unit didn’t support the foot very well
they observed sideward rolling or forward slipping during the running session
A purchaser stated that this shoe took a while to break in
A few reviewers complained that the materials looked cheap
Durability wasn’t a strong aspect of this shoe because some consumers noticed the upper easily separating from the platform

customer_reviews.title: clown shoes for the frail...
customer_reviews.text: They might be OK but... Seems like the size was mislabeled on this pair of shoes. For a size 8.5 USA, it is the longest shoe I've ever seen... appearing clownish. Then, it is extremely narrow in the heel area, such that it immediately hurts, even before standing in them. Nearly impossible to put on, since the shoe's tongue, being fixed to the sole, makes for a very narrow entrance - extra unlacing doesn't/can't help. Also, it came up in a search for shoes with a 'large toe box'. That is a miss as well. Never encountered such small shoes labeled 8.5 USA. These are cruel shoes...
customer_reviews.author: Deb B

customer_reviews.title: order a size down. 1/2
customer_reviews.text: i originally ordered the 11 and it was too long. i normally wear 11 on most shoes however these were just too big. go down 1/2 size and you will be fine. other wise these are great for the gym. they a nice grip sole, so they are perfect for any gym occasion. i used the for squats and lunges and it kept my footing in place. comfort is good overall. heel part of the shoe feels a bit narrow compared to the rest of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: mon

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Very interesting design with a good color selection. The shoes are also comfortable, and almost feel bouncy as you walk in them. UPDATE 6-5-19: I'm taking off 2 stars for 2 reasons: -The black coloring of the soles has this weird blue tone that kinda ruins the color scheme. -The shoes don't feel "centered". It's like my feet are slightly hanging off the edge of the shoes, making them much less comfortable when I think about it.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Kibler

customer_reviews.title: Fits weird.
customer_reviews.text: Tried them for a day & the best way to put it is it feels like you don't have the entire shoe under your foot. The middle is so narrow & the inside of the middle of your foot hangs off. Where your foot arches. They look dope though
customer_reviews.author: Michael Richey

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable cushioning and soles are wearing well while also providing ...
customer_reviews.text: Normally buy Asics but the quality went down and they were falling apart after just a couple months. I use for cross-training; lifting, cardio, general around the house, shorter runs, speed work. Wear 11 in Asics and 11 here fit right. The exterior is plasticy but durable. Comfortable cushioning and soles are wearing well while also providing good support. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Should have listened to reviews
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are not bad. Run 1/2 size big. If you where 12 buy an 11.5. They are narrow in the midsection of the foot. Will where more and see if they break in. They are stylish and new age. Been a longtime since I bought Reebok. Feel semi cheap but for the price they will work. If you have narrow feet they will suit you well if you have wide flat feet like myself would recommend a different choice.
customer_reviews.author: Justin M.

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker
customer_reviews.text: First note that you can only wear very thin socks or non at all. I must keep them very loosely tied or they will hurt bad over time. That said, I love them and get a lot of compliments
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I brought these sneakers for my son he said the other day ma where you get these sneakers at I want another pair super comfortable, so I’m planning on buying him another pair
customer_reviews.author: Williamsher

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds all my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Great deal, the Reebok Men's Fusion Flex Weave Sneaker are lightweight and comfortable shoes, I like the color and how they look. The quality of the entire product exceeds all my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: No laces, so can't adjust tightness
customer_reviews.text: I found these to be well made, but due to the fact that they don't have laces, there is no way to adjust their fit. They were too tight and caused me pain after a short time.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S

customer_reviews.title: Shoes is beautifull, received lots of compliments!!
customer_reviews.text: Exellent, ligth but strong material, very comfortable. I have narrow feet so a little loose un the toe box for my personal liking but still not too slack.
customer_reviews.author: G.L.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, Dont sleep on Reebok
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers literaly fit like a glove. the flexweave wraps around your feet nicely but also moves with you when doing dynamic movement. it is very light with a good cushion on the sole. when recommend
customer_reviews.author: R. MARTINEZ

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight
customer_reviews.text: I have a narrow foot and the fit is great. The shoe is very light weight and comfortable for exercise, running, and walking.
customer_reviews.author: Tomefay

customer_reviews.title: Decent shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I am personally a reebok fan. I like reebok products. I did not feel that comfortable wearing this shoe. All in all, good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Ruman K C

customer_reviews.title: Ran too small for me.  Returned.
customer_reviews.text: Love Reeboks, but these were just too tight compression to other Reeboks I’ve owned. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Korisko

customer_reviews.title: Nice but narrow
customer_reviews.text: The fit and finish are well done. However, the middle part of the shoe is narrow. The back and front have ample size. This is on top of the fact I bought a half size bigger, 12.5
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.title: False descriptions
customer_reviews.text: This said it was womans, not!! Got it home and its mens, false advertising
customer_reviews.author: sue woods

customer_reviews.title: Reebok Fusion Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great!! All of Reebok shoes are high quality and feel great on my feet. The only brand I will buy.
customer_reviews.author: Roderick  Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I wear a women’s 8.5 and I ordered these in a men’s 7 - I love em!!! Great for a wider female foot too!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah H.

customer_reviews.title: Weird liner
customer_reviews.text: These had a weird liner in them so I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Bill DD

customer_reviews.title: Would shop again
customer_reviews.text: I already had the red so I knew it would have been a perfect fit
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: It fits well
customer_reviews.text: It fits well I think it lacks some support on the soles of the feet
customer_reviews.author: Jose Miguel Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Best $20 something purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best $20 something purchase ever! I wish I bought one or two sizes for my growing son up before the price increased
customer_reviews.author: Chaye

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. A little snug to get pulled on but fits great once the foot seats in the shoe. Seams to be the design. I always leave my shoes loose enough to just slip them on and go. These not so much. The tounge is attached on both sides with high strength elastic therefore the tounge never shifts. I love them
customer_reviews.author: Brad S.

customer_reviews.title: Good color and product.
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly and the person I bought it for loved it...
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Iyoha

customer_reviews.title: Narrow
customer_reviews.text: Everyone I showed these to said that they looked super nice which I agree, the only thing is that they're narrow and I have wide feet. So they're not to comfortable for me
customer_reviews.author: Jack Conde Hurst Jr

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Look good. After a few hours in them my feet start hurting.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Toma

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice true to size fit but unfortunately not comfortable for my feet. Hope it works better for others.
customer_reviews.author: David A Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Super narrow
customer_reviews.text: Shoe was very narrow in the middle. Felt like I was standing on the hard edge of the sole
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy Shane

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Don’t think twice, if you want it, go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Ebuka

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I like them they're pretty comfortable I just can't seem to find slim enough jeans so that they don't go over the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Forreal

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for gym wear and they are very comfortable and fit well. Only problem is that there a little hard to get on because the tongue is fixed place. 5 out 5 best shoe ever worn
customer_reviews.author: Park

customer_reviews.title: Fits true to size
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband and he loved em! Fits true to size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicr shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice in everythin fit, designer very very soft. I recomended to everybody
customer_reviews.author: juan lainez

customer_reviews.title: Narrow foot needed
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are tighter than advertised. You need a narrow foot for the shoe to be true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jones

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHOE!!!
customer_reviews.text: AFTER A COUPLE OF RUNS WITH THIS SHOE THEY FEEL GREAT...I WILL BE BUYING ANOTHER PAIR IN BLACK SOON.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS

customer_reviews.title: Don't be jealous
customer_reviews.text: There is literally nothing like a pair of shoes that make your feet feel awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Earl

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, it's so comfortable. I had a 12k tryout and my feet didn't get exhausted at all!
customer_reviews.author: jeremytung

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable and excellent shoe.
customer_reviews.text: One of the most comfortable shoe I ever had! 100% recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Van Lian

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and forces me to walk with open arches
customer_reviews.text: great shoe. Someone with wide or flat feet may not like them though.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: This is what a shoe should be like !!!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the shoe very much, The fit is good as expected, stylish and comfy !!!!
customer_reviews.author: SAROJ KUMAR MAHANTA

customer_reviews.title: TOO TIGHT TO ENJOY!
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is very tight in the middle. I thought after a few wears that it would loosen up, but to no avail. Also, if you are thinking about adding a different insole, forget about it, made my feet hurt for over a week.
customer_reviews.author: Cedric Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like them, but I'm use to providing my own insole and these have no room.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Flynn

product_meta.title: Reebok Men's Fusion Flexweave Ankle-High Running Shoe
product_meta.description: When it comes to finding the right pair of athletic shoes, you just can't beat quality design. While there may be many different types of shoes to choose from, a great pair of running shoes is specifically designed for just that, running. Design is how Reebok shoes distinguish themselves above the rest. While most people think shoe design only affects the comfort of your feet, in reality, shoe design can affect your whole body. Reebok shoes were meticulously crafted with this in mind. Reebok shoes feature a manmade sole able to effortlessly provide the traction needed to keep you moving forward at full speed while also supplying the flexibility to enable you to move naturally. Additionally, this stylish footwear is constructed with a synthetic fabric able to absorb any excess moisture while creating a light-weight, breathable atmosphere for your feet. The fusion of form and function in Reebok shoes makes them the best athletic shoes for those seeking to unleash their natural potential on the track. Slip on a pair of Reebok shoes and experience the superior comfort and support that Reebok shoes were designed to provide.
feature_bullets: Best for: Gym workouts, cardio workouts
International products have separate terms, are sold from abroad and may differ from local products, including fit, age ratings, and language of product, labeling or instructions.
